body.p:
Mossey Creek Tenn
March 21st 1865
D. Lindsey
Adjt. Genl. Ky Vol.
Genl.

I have to honor to State that you Commissioned me as first Lieut. in Company.D. 11th Ky Cav on the 11th day of November 1864 since which time I have performed the duty of such up to the present time and am now informed by Lt. Col. Slator that I cannot be mustered in the Company owing to the Company having but six months to serve

I would also beg leave to state that the commission I now hold gives me a great deal of trouble to draw my pay as Sergt. and trust that you will not think hard of me to ask that you cancel my commission and I will wait untill some future time that promotion might offer in my own Company

Verry Respectfully
Your Obt. Servant.
John Bradburn

11 Cavy
Mossey Creek Tenn.
Mar. 21. 1865
Bradburn John
Says he cannot get mustered on enclosed commission, and asks that the same be cancelled-
cancel this commission and "by request" and notify him of same
D W Lindsey
Adj Genl Ky

cancelled & notification of same sent to him
Apl 3/65
Recd A. G. O. Ky 31 Mar. 1865
